product_name: Gear Aid Seam Grip Seam Sealer
long_description: Winner of the prestigious Backpacker Magazine's Editors' Choice Gold Award, the all-purpose Gear Aid Seam Grip Seam Sealer helps waterproof your gear for outdoor fun in wet weather.
